long_description: All-natural Clif Crunch granola bars serve as a light snack that gives you enough energy to get through the day. Clif Crunch granola bars are made with all-natural and 70% organic ingredients. Peanut Butter flavor melds whole grains with creamy peanut butter chips. White Chocolate Macadamia flavor combines macadamia nuts, crunchy organic whole grains and creamy white chocolate chips. Chocolate Chip flavor includes lots of tasty chocolate chips. Box includes five 2-bar pouches for a total of 10 bars. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: All-natural Clif Crunch granola bars serve as a light snack that gives you enough energy to get through the day.
